author: neilg
msg: further fix for EBCDIC file i/o performance.  This also enables more EBCDIC encodings to work with the parser.  Thanks to Henry Zongaro for finding the lines that needed tweaking.

author: rahuls
msg: XSDHandler#parseSchema signature is changed. The call to parseSchema should use updated signature.

author: sandygao
msg: Use XSDDescription as the parameter to XSDHandler#parseSchema().

author: sandygao
msg: Don't always use a new resource identifier object when calling the user's entity resolver. Try to use the one passed in, because it could contain more information (schema namespace, for example.)

author: sandygao
msg: 2. Pass XSDDescription as the parameter to XSDHandler#parseSchema()
3. Pass XSDDescription as the parameter to XMLEntityManager#resolveEntity()
